Fusion Chicken Curry
Porciones: 4 servings
Calories: 380kcal

INGREDIENTS:
500g chicken breast
2 tbsp aceite de oliva
1 large onion/cebolla
3 cloves/dientes de ajo
2cm fresh ginger/jengibre
400ml coconut milk/leche de coco
2 cucharadas curry powder
1/2 tsp ground cumin
Salt & pepper to taste
100g frozen peas/guisantes
Fresh cilantro/cilantro fresco

PREPARATION/PREPARACIÓN:
1. Cut chicken into 2.5cm cubes
2. Heat 2tbsp oil in large pan
3. Sofría la cebolla hasta que esté transparente
4. Add garlic and ginger, cook 1min
5. Add chicken, cook until golden
6. Incorporate spices/especias
7. Pour in coconut milk, simmer 15-20min
8. Add frozen peas, cook 3-4min more
9. Garnish with fresh cilantro/Decorar con cilantro fresco

Notes/Notas:
- Can be served with rice or naan
- Puede congelarse hasta 3 meses
